Definition at line 19 of file common.hpp.\hypertarget{common_8hpp_a271aec21de7813118df94f87fe884e60}{
\index{common.hpp@{common.hpp}!TRSL\_\-VERSION\_\-NR@{TRSL\_\-VERSION\_\-NR}}
\index{TRSL\_\-VERSION\_\-NR@{TRSL\_\-VERSION\_\-NR}!common.hpp@{common.hpp}}
\paragraph[{TRSL\_\-VERSION\_\-NR}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define TRSL\_\-VERSION\_\-NR~100020200}\hfill}
\label{common_8hpp_a271aec21de7813118df94f87fe884e60}


Code version number. Defined as 1{\itshape MMmmbbii\/}, where {\itshape MM\/} is the major release number, {\itshape mm\/} is the minor release number, {\itshape bb\/} is the bug-\/fix release number, and {\itshape ii\/} is the internal release number. 

Definition at line 27 of file common.hpp.
